system.effect:
Effect: Choose and perform one of the cheers below. You may perform each Cheer only once per Scene.
» Don’t Stop Now!: All allies on the Field gain Temporary Hit Points equal to your Charm Rank and become Motivated.
» I Believe In You!: All allies on the Field gain a +2 Bonus to evasion for 1 full round and become Cheered.
» Show Your Best!: Choose Def, or Sp.Def, all allies on the Field gain +1 CS in the chosen Stat and become Excited.
» You Can Do It!: Choose Atk, Sp.Atk, or Spd, all allies on the Field gain +1 CS in the chosen Stat and become Encouraged.
system.frequency: Scene x4 – Standard Action + Rapid Action
system.name: Go, Fight, Win! [CR]
